gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Thunder 118, Grizzlies 112
gameRecap.excerpt: The Thunder defeated the Grizzlies, 118-112. Jalen Williams (23 points, seven rebounds, six assists, two blocks), Chet Holmgren (22 points, 11 rebounds, three blocks), and Shai Gilgeous-Alexander (20 points, seven rebounds) led the Thunder as Desmond Bane (22 points, seven assists) led the Grizzlies in the loss. The win gives OKC five in their last six contests as they move to 47-20, as the Grizzlies fall to 23-45.
